greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = n - (sum of primes factors of n (with repetition)).
link: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
formula: a(n) = 0 if n is prime or if n = 4. - _Alonso del Arte_, Jul 31 2018
mathematica: Join[{1}, Table[n - Total[Times@@@FactorInteger[n]], {n, 2, 80}]] (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Sep 20 2011 *)
program: (MAGMA) [n eq 1 select 1 else n-(&+[p[1]*p[2]: p in Factorization(n)]): n in [1..80]]; // _G. C. Greubel_, Jan 11 2019
(Sage) [n - sum(factor(n)[j][0]*factor(n)[j][1] for j in range(0, len(factor(n)))) for n in range(1, 80)] # _G. C. Greubel_, Jan 11 2019
xref: Cf. A145834 (= 0 followed by the nonzero terms of this sequence). - _M. F. Hasler_, Oct 31 2008
results.author: _Zak Seidov_, Sep 10 2002
